name: df-fae
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cfae, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cuni(crn(cmeas)), copab(s2, s3, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), co(cdm(cv(s0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s3), co(cdm(cv(s0)), cmap, cuni(cdm(cv(s1)))))), wbr(crab(s4, cuni(cdm(cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)), cv(s0), cfv(cv(s3), cv(s4)))), cae, cv(s1))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ ~ae =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(measures)‚Ü¶ { < s2, s3 > |((s2 ‚àà(dom(s0)[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(s1))‚àß s3 ‚àà(dom(s0)[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(s1)))‚àß { s4 ‚àà ‚ãÉ dom(s1)|(s2 ` s4)[s0](s3 ` s4)}[ae]s1)})
comment: Define a builder for an 'almost everywhere' relation between functions, from relations between function values. In this definition, the range of ` f ` and ` g ` is enforced in order to ensure the resulting relation is a set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)
